income_messages:
From: m***************1@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2022-07-12 17:17:41
SUBJECT: No Subject
Sent from: mrsdorabaoxinyan1@gmail.com
Hi
From: m***************1@gmail.com
To: vb06763@m**************p
Time: 2022-07-21 23:42:56
SUBJECT: Re:
Dear Friend,
I hope you're doing well.
I'm Mrs Dora Bao Xin Yan,I found your information on the Internet and then
contacted you to share a business proposal with you.
Can I send  details?
Waiting for your prompt response.
Regards,
Mrs. Dora Bao Xin Yan.
From: m***************1@gmail.com
To: vb06763@m**************p
Time: 2022-07-22 08:12:27
SUBJECT: Re:
Dear friend,
I am sharing this information with you because of some past situation in
Hong Kong since previous years, which arose as a result of the demand for
the total removal of the extradition law to the demand for a full
democracy. My dear country is on the verge of collapsing as China has
refused to grant the request of the protesters. Our country is no longer
safe for children and young adults; hence the more reason I want to
relocate is for the safety of my kids and as well give them a better life.
There has been a long series of violent clashes between the police and
protesters, unlawful in castration of people is predominant now.  Currently
we have another issue which is COVID19 brought by China upon us mainly to
stop the massive protest of Hong Kongers and to shut down the economy of
other Countries that would speak up for Hong Kong. Regrettably/
unfortunately the virus has become a global pandemic. More worrisome is the
new anti-government ambiguous national security law passed by China. Our
civil liberties are tightly restrained in the law and loyalty to the
Communist Part is paramount. Relocating and settling down with children
which I want to do requires a lot of funds which I do not have and it is
necessary we do that now..
I will like to introduce myself, my name is Mrs.Dora Bao Xin Yan. I am the
Chief Operating Officer of OCBC Wing Hang Bank Limited in Hong Kong. I am
an Investment Director responsible for the management of private portfolios
of clients including trust, charities and pension funds. I would
respectfully request that you keep the contents of this mail confidential
and respect the integrity of the information you come by as a result of
this mail. I have been in charge of this department for more than 13 years
and to the best of my knowledge I have discharged my duty with equity and
fairness.
While reviewing the financial report by my department I discovered some
portfolios belonging to some deceased clients who had no next-of-kin to
inherit their funds. Some of the portfolios contain:  10 million, 16.5
million, 18 and 20 million (all in dollars) among others.
Hence, I am contacting you about the portfolio containing
USD$32,561,323(Thirty Two million, five hundred and sixty one thousand,
three hundred and twenty three united states dollars) belonging to Mr.
Ignacio (the deceased) with a subject matter; Ref: LB/TSB/958/042/0511. In
2010, the subject matter; Ref: LB/TSB/958/042/0511 came to our bank. To
engage in business discussions with our Private Banking Services
Department. He informed us that he had a financial portfolio of
($32,561,323) Thirty Two million, five hundred and sixty one thousand,
three hundred and twenty three united states dollars, which he wished to
have us turn over (invest) on his behalf. I was the officer assigned to his
case; I made numerous suggestions in line with my duties as the Director of
the Private Banking Services Department, especially given the volume of
funds he wished to put into our bank.
A few months later his attention was needed regarding a business which I
was going to discuss with him but I was unable to reach him, I made futile
efforts to locate him I immediately passed the task of locating him to the
internal investigations department of our bank. Four days later,
information started to trickle in, that he was apparently dead, a person
who suited his description was declared dead of a heart attack in Cannes,
South of France; we were soon able to gather more information and the cause
of death was confirmed. The bank immediately launched an investigation into
possible surviving next of kin to alert about the situation and also to
come forward to claim his funds. If you are familiar with private banking
affairs, those who patronize our services usually prefer anonymity, but
also some levels of detachment from conventional processes. In his bio-data
form, he listed no next of kin. In the field of private banking, opening an
account with us means no one will know of its existence, accounts are
rarely held under a name; depositors use numbers and codes to make the
accounts anonymous. The bank also gives the choice to depositors of having
their mail sent to them or held at the bank itself, ensuring that there are
no traces of the account and as I said, rarely do they nominate next of
kin. The bank has spent great amounts of money trying to track the family
of the deceased; they have investigated for months and have found no family
but however, the investigation has officially come to an end.
I am prepared to place you in the position next–of–kin and have our Bank
release the funds to you as the closest surviving relatives as he did not
indicate any next–of–kin while opening the investment with us. Upon receipt
of the deposit, I am prepared to share the money with you in half. That is,
I will simply nominate you as the beneficiary and have them release the
deposit to you. We will share the fund 50/50.
I assure you that I could have the deposit released to you in a few days. I
will simply inform our bank of the final closing of the file relating to
the deceased customer. If you find yourself interested to work with me,
please contact me specifically, if you give me a positive response, I will
initiate this process towards a quick conclusion as I really need to
relocate as soon as possible. It is important to inform you that under no
condition should you contact me via official channels. I will simply deny
knowing you and about this project.
I repeat I do not want you contacting me through our officials lines
neither do I want you contacting me through my official account, you can
only contact me through this personal email I write you with. I do not want
any direct link between you and me. My official lines are not secured lines
as they are periodically monitored to assess our level of customer care in
line with our Total Quality Management Policy, Please observe this
instruction religiously.
I ask that you do not destroy my chance of surviving. If you will not work
with me let me know and let me move on with my life but do not destroy me.
I am a family woman, this is an opportunity to take them to a safer country
and give them a better live.
I know within me that nothing ventured is nothing gained, and that success
and riches never come easy or on a platter of gold. This is the one truth I
have learned from my private banking clients. Do not betray my confidence.
If we can be of one accord, we should act swiftly on this.
In the light of the above, it will be appreciated if you can confirm your
readiness and willingness to work with me in executing this project in a
very discrete and quiet manner, to avoid any form of distraction and
prattling that will jeopardize this project, as you will agree that lose
lips sink ships.
I request you to please also provide me with a swift response, to enable me
confirm your readiness to cooperate with me in executing this project.
At this juncture I shall wait for your swift response.
Regard
Mrs.Dora Bao Xin Yan.
From: m***************1@gmail.com
To: vb06763@m**************p
Time: 2022-07-22 11:36:34
SUBJECT: Re:
Dear Partner,
I want to thank you for your email response, I sincerely appreciate your
interest to assist me in this transaction. Bear in mind that situations
here in Hong Kong has escalated becoming more violent and protesters are
being called terrorist by China. All Hong Kongers especially those with
foreign links are closely monitored and sometimes are being held at the
Border by China. Hence, I would like to be sure of your willingness,
trustworthiness and commitment to execute this transaction with me, I
cannot afford to compromise these virtues for our sake because this
transaction is highly sensitive, I have my principles which will profit the
both of us. I will need you to follow my instruction to enable us have this
transaction completed on time.
I know you might be wondering where I got your email contact but to be
honest with you, I got your contact email discretely on the internet during
my search for a reliable partner who have same last name as my deceased
client and be of assistance to me in order to have the funds transferred
out, if you read my previous emails properly I have explained why I need
your assistance, I did consider what you might think about my kind of
person but when you know that the safety of your kids are threatened and
their lives are in danger you will act just like me as a mother which is to
protect your loved ones.
The fact remains that I cannot transfer the funds in my own name, this is
the main reason your assistance as a foreigner is required. I would have
gone ahead to ask the funds be released to me, but that would have drawn a
straight line to me and my involvement in claiming the deposit, but on the
other hand, you as an indifferent foreigner would easily pass as the
beneficiary with the rights to claim. I assure you that I could have the
deposit released to you in a few days. I will simply inform our bank of the
final closing of the file relating to the customer, I will then officially
communicate with the finance company and instruct them to release the
deposit to you; with these two things: all is done. The best would be for
us to have the firm direct the funds to another bank with you as account
holder but the bank must have same telex-type with our bank here in Hong
Kong, this way your protection is sealed too. We can fine-tune this based
on our interactions.
Considering the money involved, it is necessary for me to be sure of the
person to whom I will be entrusting this transaction, my trust is not given
out lightly and I do not expect you to trust me that easy too, so I need to
be convinced that you are a matured person with some integrity and I will
also prove my integrity to you. With regards to the legality of this
transaction, I want to inform you that the attorney I am using will prepare
the affidavits which shall legally put you in place as beneficiary; and
will obtain the necessary clearances which will cover all the aspects
involved in this transaction from the Hong Kong authorities including the
Justice department. Every documents will be done to meet all international
beneficiary claim standards and I will be responsible for his payment so
don't think about that.
I must also inform you that you will not have to travel to anywhere for any
reason, because the attorney shall be handling all matters of probate on
your behalf, you will be duly represented here by the attorney, he is an
accredited lawyer with vast experience in issues of inheritance here in
Hong Kong. He will have all the documents perfected, and with these
documents he shall come forward to apply for the immediate release and
transfer of the funds to you.
What I expect from you is trust and commitment, I want this large sum of
money transferred with your assistance, and as a banker for many years I
know that if we follow up this transaction diligently it would be completed
as soon as possible without any question.
I want to know if you are willing to follow up this business seriously
before I can give you more details about this transaction, as a result of
which I shall be waiting for your response and assurance, you need to be
someone whom I can rely upon, at least for absolute commitment.
Regard
Mrs.Dora Bao Xin Yan

Time: 2022-07-24 14:47:36
SUBJECT: RE
Hello Dear hope you are doing well and your family as well
I have been wondering i haven't heard from you since a while now
Please get back to me so we can get this transaction out in a few days.
But you are not showing your commitment and i will also want you to know
that am still waiting for you because i know deep in my heart you are the
right partner for this transaction
and also remember that this transaction is highly capital intensive which
can change both live's
Please i want your assistance in achieving this transaction
I await to hear from you soon your sister
Mrs Dora Bao Xin Yan.

Mrs Dora Bao Xin Yan.
From: m***************1@gmail.com
To: vb06763@m**************p
Time: 2022-07-25 13:06:49
SUBJECT: Re: RE
Good Day,
Thank you once again for your genuine interest in this transaction, I am
very glad to note that you are a noble, matured, and trustworthy person
whom I can rely on for your capabilities to handle this transaction, and
for a person of your status and experience I am very confident doing this
business with you.
Like I said before, due to this issue on my hands now it became necessary
for me to seek your assistance, I appreciate the fact that you are ready to
assist me in executing this project, and also you will help me in investing
my share of the money in your country or somewhere else, I am quite certain
about that. You should not have anything to worry about, I will do
everything legally required to ensure that the project goes smoothly, it
shall pass through all Laws of International Banking and beneficiary
claims, you have my word.
Having resolved to entrust this transaction into your hands, I want to
remind you that it needs your commitment and diligent follow up. If you
work seriously, the entire transaction should be over in a couple of days...
READ THE FOLLOWING AND GET BACK TO ME:
Firstly, you should note that this project is highly capital intensive,
this is why I have to be very careful, I need your total devotion and trust
to see this through, I know we have not met before but I am very confident
that we will be able to establish the necessary trust that we need to
execute this project.
I am now in search of a foreign on-line bank which I may require that you
open an account in your name in this foreign bank.I will find a bank that
you can open an account on-line with request for your fiscal present. The
money would be transferred to your account which you will open in this bank
for both of us, this is one of the ways I have found, and it will protect
us from my local banks in my country, I want us to enjoy this money in
peace when we conclude, so you should listen to my instructions and follow
them religiously. Also you have to know that I cannot transfer this money
in my name and i dont have the same last name as the deceased as my bank
will be aware that it is from me, this is where I need you.
As a result of this you may have to open an account in the corresponding
bank that has the same transfer telex type with my bank, I will obtain a
certificate of deposit from my bank, it will be issued in your name, and
this will make you the beneficiary of the funds. After the money is
released it will be transferred to your account for both of us and we can
then instruct the bank to transfer our various shares into our respective
home bank accounts bit by bit, I will also perfect the documents with the
assistance of my attorney to give the transaction the legal right.
Before we commence all this things, I will need to do the paperwork that
will place you as the beneficiary of the fund so I will need you to send me
the below details:
The information I need is as follows;
Full Names:
Address (address must include street/house number, postcode, city and
country) Telephone numbers/Cell Phone Numbers:
Fax Numbers (If any):
Date of Birth:
Occupation:
Country of Resident and a valid identification documents (international
passport, driver’s license or a national Identity card)
I will give them to the attorney who will do the paperwork and it will also
prove to me that I am transacting with the correct person and as soon as I
get these from you I will commence the paperwork that will place you as the
beneficiary. I hope you will understand why I need all these, the money in
question is big and I want to ensure that I know you well before I proceed
to give you all the details to commence the project.
Ensure that you keep this project confidential because of the confidential
nature of this transaction and my work.
Please reply soonest.
Best Regards,
Mrs Dora Bao Xin Yan.
From: m***************1@gmail.com
To: vb06763@m**************p
Time: 2022-07-25 13:59:56
SUBJECT: Re: RE
Thank you very much for your quick response to my message. What you need to

Thank you very much for your understanding and kindness.
From: m***************1@gmail.com
To: vb06763@m**************p
Time: 2022-07-25 14:11:42
SUBJECT: Re: RE
Hello dear partner,
Thank you for your fast response to my email,i read your message and i
understand you very well and i decided to make things very clear to you:
You see, next of kinship is not limited to relations of the deceased, and
it is not admitted to the circuit of parental relationship, and it is
optional in the context of a benefactor to whom he wish to will it (the
beneficiary) or write formally or informally by secret information
disclosure to the recipient to be His / Her business partner, cousin,
friends or well-wishers,therefore by virtue of the above, you can stand in
as the next of kin of the deceased since you have the same last name and
came from the same country.
Keep in mind, as I had indicated in my previous post that if no one is
introduced to the bank as the next of kin to my late client, who will be
entitled to the fund, it will be frozen after the expiry of the bank
insolvent Directors will divide it among themselves . Thus, in the other to
prevent this negative development, hence I contacted you to look for the
help that you will be presented as the relation of my late client  for the
claim.
So what you have to do now is to go ahead and follow my instructions so
that everything will move in a good condition.
Thank you very much for your understanding and kindness and am waiting to
hear from you asap.
Your Sister,
Mrs Dora Bao Xin Yan.

client and be of assistance to me in order to have the funds transferred
out, if you read my previous emails properly I have explained why I need
your assistance, I did consider what you might think about my kind of
person but when you know that the safety of your kids are threatened and
their lives are in danger you will act just like me as a mother which is to
protect your loved ones.
The fact remains that I cannot transfer the funds in my own name, this is
the main reason your assistance as a foreigner is required. I would have
gone ahead to ask the funds be released to me, but that would have drawn a
straight line to me and my involvement in claiming the deposit, but on the
other hand, you as an indifferent foreigner would easily pass as the
beneficiary with the rights to claim. I assure you that I could have the
deposit released to you in a few days. I will simply inform our bank of the
final closing of the file relating to the customer, I will then officially
communicate with the finance company and instruct them to release the
deposit to you; with these two things: all is done. The best would be for
us to have the firm direct the funds to another bank with you as account
holder but the bank must have same telex-type with our bank here in Hong
Kong, this way your protection is sealed too. We can fine-tune this based
on our interactions.
Considering the money involved, it is necessary for me to be sure of the
person to whom I will be entrusting this transaction, my trust is not given
out lightly and I do not expect you to trust me that easy too, so I need to
be convinced that you are a matured person with some integrity and I will
also prove my integrity to you. With regards to the legality of this
transaction, I want to inform you that the attorney I am using will prepare
the affidavits which shall legally put you in place as beneficiary; and
will obtain the necessary clearances which will cover all the aspects
involved in this transaction from the Hong Kong authorities including the
Justice department. Every documents will be done to meet all international
beneficiary claim standards and I will be responsible for his payment so
don't think about that.
I must also inform you that you will not have to travel to anywhere for any
reason, because the attorney shall be handling all matters of probate on
your behalf, you will be duly represented here by the attorney, he is an
accredited lawyer with vast experience in issues of inheritance here in
Hong Kong. He will have all the documents perfected, and with these
documents he shall come forward to apply for the immediate release and
transfer of the funds to you.
What I expect from you is trust and commitment, I want this large sum of
money transferred with your assistance, and as a banker for many years I
know that if we follow up this transaction diligently it would be completed
as soon as possible without any question.
I want to know if you are willing to follow up this business seriously
before I can give you more details about this transaction, as a result of
which I shall be waiting for your response and assurance, you need to be
someone whom I can rely upon, at least for absolute commitment.
Regard
Mrs.Dora Bao Xin Yan

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re:
conversations.body:
That sounds like a great chance for both of us. I would like to talk further about your plans.
Best,
Irving

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: RE
conversations.body:
Hello Dear hope you are doing well and your family as well
I have been wondering i haven't heard from you since a while now
Please get back to me so we can get this transaction out in a few days.
But you are not showing your commitment and i will also want you to know
that am still waiting for you because i know deep in my heart you are the
right partner for this transaction
and also remember that this transaction is highly capital intensive which
can change both live's
Please i want your assistance in achieving this transaction
I await to hear from you soon your sister
Mrs Dora Bao Xin Yan.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: RE
conversations.body:
Dear Partner
Thank you for your message, I just want to confirm your readiness to help
me and to also keep this discreet to protect us both. I also want to inform
you that it will require a little documentation to present you as the
beneficiary. This documentation will make you the next of kin to the
deceased. It will be done by an Attorney. I hope this will not be a concern
to you?
I await your response to confirm your willingness
Mrs Dora Bao Xin Yan.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: RE
conversations.body:
I am looking forward to this opportunity, though I want to fully know the potential risks and your plan.
Best,
Irving

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: RE
conversations.body:
Good Day,
Thank you once again for your genuine interest in this transaction, I am
very glad to note that you are a noble, matured, and trustworthy person
whom I can rely on for your capabilities to handle this transaction, and
for a person of your status and experience I am very confident doing this
business with you.
Like I said before, due to this issue on my hands now it became necessary
for me to seek your assistance, I appreciate the fact that you are ready to
assist me in executing this project, and also you will help me in investing
my share of the money in your country or somewhere else, I am quite certain
about that. You should not have anything to worry about, I will do
everything legally required to ensure that the project goes smoothly, it
shall pass through all Laws of International Banking and beneficiary
claims, you have my word.
Having resolved to entrust this transaction into your hands, I want to
remind you that it needs your commitment and diligent follow up. If you
work seriously, the entire transaction should be over in a couple of days...
READ THE FOLLOWING AND GET BACK TO ME:
Firstly, you should note that this project is highly capital intensive,
this is why I have to be very careful, I need your total devotion and trust
to see this through, I know we have not met before but I am very confident
that we will be able to establish the necessary trust that we need to
execute this project.
I am now in search of a foreign on-line bank which I may require that you
open an account in your name in this foreign bank.I will find a bank that
you can open an account on-line with request for your fiscal present. The
money would be transferred to your account which you will open in this bank
for both of us, this is one of the ways I have found, and it will protect
us from my local banks in my country, I want us to enjoy this money in
peace when we conclude, so you should listen to my instructions and follow
them religiously. Also you have to know that I cannot transfer this money
in my name and i dont have the same last name as the deceased as my bank
will be aware that it is from me, this is where I need you.
As a result of this you may have to open an account in the corresponding
bank that has the same transfer telex type with my bank, I will obtain a
certificate of deposit from my bank, it will be issued in your name, and
this will make you the beneficiary of the funds. After the money is
released it will be transferred to your account for both of us and we can
then instruct the bank to transfer our various shares into our respective
home bank accounts bit by bit, I will also perfect the documents with the
assistance of my attorney to give the transaction the legal right.
Before we commence all this things, I will need to do the paperwork that
will place you as the beneficiary of the fund so I will need you to send me
the below details:
The information I need is as follows;
Full Names:
Address (address must include street/house number, postcode, city and
country) Telephone numbers/Cell Phone Numbers:
Fax Numbers (If any):
Date of Birth:
Occupation:
Country of Resident and a valid identification documents (international
passport, driver’s license or a national Identity card)
I will give them to the attorney who will do the paperwork and it will also
prove to me that I am transacting with the correct person and as soon as I
get these from you I will commence the paperwork that will place you as the
beneficiary. I hope you will understand why I need all these, the money in
question is big and I want to ensure that I know you well before I proceed
to give you all the details to commence the project.
Ensure that you keep this project confidential because of the confidential
nature of this transaction and my work.
Please reply soonest.
Best Regards,
Mrs Dora Bao Xin Yan.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: RE
conversations.body:
I am really keen to cooperate with you. But is there any potential risks that could effect your company and me?
Best,
Irving

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: RE
conversations.body:
Thank you very much for your quick response to my message. What you need to
know is that this transaction is 100% risk free so I will need you to
follow my instructions first and foremost and confidentiality secondly.
Thank you very much for your understanding and kindness.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: RE
conversations.body:
I am looking forward to this opportunity, though I want to fully know the potential risks and your plan.
Best,
Irving

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: RE
conversations.body:
Hello dear partner,
Thank you for your fast response to my email,i read your message and i
understand you very well and i decided to make things very clear to you:
You see, next of kinship is not limited to relations of the deceased, and
it is not admitted to the circuit of parental relationship, and it is
optional in the context of a benefactor to whom he wish to will it (the
beneficiary) or write formally or informally by secret information
disclosure to the recipient to be His / Her business partner, cousin,
friends or well-wishers,therefore by virtue of the above, you can stand in
as the next of kin of the deceased since you have the same last name and
came from the same country.
Keep in mind, as I had indicated in my previous post that if no one is
introduced to the bank as the next of kin to my late client, who will be
entitled to the fund, it will be frozen after the expiry of the bank
insolvent Directors will divide it among themselves . Thus, in the other to
prevent this negative development, hence I contacted you to look for the
help that you will be presented as the relation of my late client  for the
claim.
So what you have to do now is to go ahead and follow my instructions so
that everything will move in a good condition.
Thank you very much for your understanding and kindness and am waiting to
hear from you asap.
Your Sister,
Mrs Dora Bao Xin Yan.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: RE
conversations.body:
I am looking forward to this opportunity, though I want to fully know the potential risks and your plan.
Best,
Irving

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: RE
conversations.body: you are very stupid!!!!

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: RE
conversations.body:
That sounds like a opportunity. How long it takes to get my benefits?
Best,
Irving

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: RE
conversations.body:
If you know that you are ready to do this transaction with me just proceed
by sending the requested informations first.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: RE
conversations.body:
That sounds like a opportunity. How long it takes to get my benefits?
Best,
Irving
